Title: Executive, Project Maketing
Company: CapitaLand Development (Vietnam)
Location: Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam, Lầu 17, Tòa nhà Deutsches Haus Ho Chi Minh city, số 33 Lê Duẩn, Phường Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh
Job Description:
In charge of all Branding/Marketing matters related to Sales & Marketing department, including:
• Work with brand consultants in developing brand strategies and identities.
• Collaborate with agencies/suppliers for execution of all marketing collaterals, website, printed materials following brand guidelines.
• Produce creative and innovative contents & visuals for social media channels, PR bookings and printed materials.
• Manage marketing campaigns across online & offline platforms ensuring to reach right target audiences, meet their expectations and build the brand’s awareness/credibility.
• Take lead in collaboration and communication with vendors (consultants, media/event agencies, production houses, suppliers, etc).
• Organize events such as project launches, openings; video/photo shoots and other joint-marketing activities.
• Setting up and maintaining of Sales Galleries, Show Units, Mock-up Units, Sales Offices, etc. with high standards for smooth operations and innovative customers’ experience.
• Take lead in engagement and communication with vendors (security, cleaning, pest control, scent air, landscaping, etc.); plus colleagues across multiple departments.
• Prepare and conduct training on Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) including manpower allocation, regulations, standards to all internal and external service providers; supervise and carry out routine inspections; improve quality
• Actively coordinate with internal departments for efficient execution.
• Other ad-hoc tasks as assigned.
Job Requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Marketing or equivalent required.
• At least 3 years of experience in branding/marketing, real estate industry is a plus.
• Excellent planning, analytical, presentation and organizational skills.
• Ability to effectively manage several priorities and work as a team in a dynamic environment.
• Exceptional communication skills, as well as interpersonal style relating well to all levels within an organization.
• Highly motivated personality with willingness to learn and pursue excellence in his/her career.

Title: Sales Planning Manager
Company: Shinhan Vietnam Finance Company Limited
Location: 8/F. Lottery Tower. 77 Tran Nhan Ton. D.5. HCMC. Vietnam, 19F, 15 Tran Bach Dang, Thu Thiem, Thu Duc City, Ho Chi Minh City
Job Description:
I. Job Summary:
This position is responsible for developing, executing, and optimizing sales strategies, policies, initiatives to drive business growth and achieve sales targets. This role involves strategic planning, performance management, incentives design, contest & promotion development, collaboration with internal and external stakeholders to ensure efficient sales operations.

II. Key Roles & Responsibilities
• Developing periodic sales plans, targets, and forecasts in alignment with company’s business objectives
• Analyzing sales data to identify trends, areas of improvement, and opportunity for growth
• Providing insights on market trends, competitor analysis and sales performance to optimize sales strategies across different products
• Designing and implementing sales incentive schemes, sales contests, promotion programs to drive productivity and motivation among salesforce
• Tracking and evaluating the effectiveness of sales contests, promotion programs to ensure positive P&L and alignment with sales goals
• Optimizing sales operational costs while maintaining high performance and service quality
• Participating and proactively contributing to the new product development and launch
• Fostering a data-driven and result-oriented culture within the Department
Job Requirements:
1. Qualification
• University/Master graduated in Business Administration, Banking, Finance or Marketing

2. Work Experience
• 6-10 years of experience in Retail Banking, Consumer Finance or Fintech with at least 5 years of experience in Sales planning, strategies or sales management

3. Knowledge
• Strong understanding of Retail Banking/Consumer Finance/Fintech
• Strong understanding of financial products (Personal Cash Loan, Sales Finance, Car Loan, Home Loan, Credit Card, BNPL)
• Expertise in sales forecasting, budgeting, target setting
• Expertise in P&L management, cost optimization and sales efficiency metrics
• Expertise in change management and driving transformation

4.Skills
• Fluent English, both in speaking and writing
• Strong data-driven for decision-making
• Excellent stakeholder management and cross-functional collaboration
• Strong business acumen and problem-solving
• Ability to drive sales digitalization and process automation
• Excellent communication and leadership
Industry: Ngân Hàng & Dịch Vụ Tài Chính
Skills: Sales Planning, Strategic Planning, Performance Management, Collaborative Sales Planning, Sales Strategy

Title: Customer Service Supervisor
Company: Công Ty TNHH Yusen Logistics (Việt Nam)
Location: No.06, Tu Do Avenue Street, Vietnam-Singapore Industrial Park, Thuan An District, Sai Gon Riverside Office Building, 2A-4A Ton Duc Thang, District No 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Phòng 805, Tòa nhà HITC, 239 Xuân Thủy, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội

1. Receive customer’s requests:
- Receive requests and related documents from customers or Yusen overseas agents (service quotes, import / export procedures for goods, problem solving, ...) and check the conditions of performing services for customers
Coordinate to check documents, delivery conditions, and related costs to identify the payer and confirm payment. Or transfer to the BDD for quotation.

2. Coordinate to carry out the plan according to customer requirements:
- Follow closely the schedule and update information, shipment status and arising problems (if any) to customers. Adjust the delivery / pick up plan appropriately according to actual situation.
- Coordinate, corporate and follow up the results with the operation departments to solve arising issues related to the shipment, report to the management directly to give a suitable and timely solution advice.

3. Supervise daily jobs of subordinates:
- Supervise and support staff to receive requests from customers, as well as coordinate to implement the daily plan in accordance with the process, guidance, ensure the progress.

4. Assist Superiors in managing department:
- Regularly check and propose plans for the contingency and transfer work

5. Others:
- Establish and maintain relationships, support to look for new and potential customers.
- Update regularly group KPIs and report to superior.
Job Requirements:
- Graduated from University/College, priority in Transportation/Economics or other relevant fields
- Having 2-3 years experiences in logistics field
- Problem Solving and Decision-making
- Logistics operation of import and export goods, knowledge of logistics service chain

Administrative stream includes those who primarily support others by performing skilled technical, administrative or operational tasks.
Jobs may range from highly supervised entry-level workers, technicians, and administrative staff to experienced individual contributors with robust technical or practical knowledge in specific areas, who have an ability to execute specialized work to support operations.
At the top of this career stream, individuals work independently and apply standards, yet can also make departures from established processes to resolve problems.

A colleague who is working in Customer Service within the E-commerce Logistics sector and brings 2–3 years of relevant experience.
A colleague at this level works on tasks of limited scope and complexity, exercises independent judgment within defined boundaries and guidelines and typically under supervision.
The colleague has skills developed through job-related training and on-the-job experience within a specific job discipline.
Colleagues have knowledge of standardized work routines and methods, general facts and information but may need to escalate non-routine problems to a more experienced colleague or supervisor.

Job Description:
- Triển khai tổng hợp thông tin, nghiên cứu thị trường và đánh giá tính khả thi của dự án tiềm năng; Lập báo cáo đầu tư và Tham gia xây dựng các quy trình, tiêu chí đánh giá khả thi dự án.

* Thực hiện phân tích, rà soát các vấn đề liên quan đến pháp lý dự án, pháp lý doanh nghiệp, tài chính… của dự án tiềm năng.

* Đi khảo sát và làm báo cáo nghiên cứu tổng quan thị trường hoặc chuyên đề theo yêu cầu công việc.

- Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm làm việc tại các công ty chủ đầu tư dự án bất động sản.

3. Kiến thức chuyên môn:

- Có thể đi công tác dài ngày

Title: Integrated Sales Executive (Mandarin Speaking)
Company: A.P. Moller-Maersk
Location: 9th floor - Tower 1, Capital Place, 29 Lieu Giai street, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi, Vietnam, Ho Chi Minh
Job Description:
We are looking for a Sales Executive to help us meet our new Chinese speaking customer acquisition and revenue growth targets on both Ocean & Logistics services by keeping our company competitive and innovative.

We Offer
This is an exciting career opportunity in an international, challenging business setting known for diversity and being a high paced environment. You will get to focus on creating valuable relations with current and new customers and work with highly professional teams in an environment where you will be valued, recognized and well rewarded. You will work with amazing and diverse colleagues with a deep sense of commitment to live Our Values and together, go all the way for our customers, society and for each other.

Responsibilities:
- Manage the current assigned portfolio, and mainly develop new customers; secure business and achieve objectives within the Sales Channel (for Ocean, Air Freight, LCL, Customs, Trucking, warehousing, middle miles).
- Build a good understanding and relationship with key and big Chinese speaking customers / potential customers to get business opportunities.
- Build a good understanding of all service offerings to be able to offer integrated logistics solutions.
- Develop customer value propositions for appropriate business opportunities. Strive for consultative sales to distinguish market presence by effectively probing and identifying needs and suggesting solutions to help customers.
- Follow direction settings and stay on top of business signals to secure both long-term and short-term opportunities.
- Communicate significant trends, price fluctuation and policies to assigned portfolio.
- Work closely with Customer Service, Commercial Planning, Product and other related functions to ensure customer needs and market intelligence are updated and communicated. Coordinate and execute commercial approach in response to customer needs and the market situation.
- Research and understand the territory/verticals to identify and establish business contacts with potential customers.
- Ensure sales systems and reporting are precise and up to date for management tracking, analysis and planning.
Job Requirements:
• More than 5 years’ work experience in shipping and logistics industry with 3 years of experience in the same position.
• A good understanding of Ocean and wide range of logistics services.
• Deep understands the competitive landscape, and can adjust approaches to customers as a result.
• Fluency in Vietnamese, English and Mandarin (Chinese).
• Proven track record of targeting, pursuing and winning large opportunities, through both personal and collaborative selling efforts, in tendered and non tendered environments.
• Strong presence and ability to communicate / present / consult with ‘C’ level decision makers in chinese speaking company.
• Good understanding on cross border trucking service between China and Vietnam.
• Ability to work independently or a TEAM player in a fast-paced international environment and cope with large scale business challenges.
• Capable in building strong and lasting relationships and networks at multiple levels, focusing on decision makers and influencers, both locally and internationally.
• Well-developed communication, persuasiveness, influencing and presentation skills as well as ability to do needs evaluation and handle most common customer objections.
• Has strong negotiation skills and project management.
• Resilient, tenacious and persistent.
• Self Motivated and performance driven.
Skills: Communication Skills, Customer Experience Management, Negotiation Skills, Sales & Business Development, Sales & Business Development, Sales & Business Development, Fluent In Mandarin Chinese
Keyword: Kinh Doanh, Bán Hàng/Phát Triển Kinh Doanh, Hậu cần/Giao nhận, Communication Skills, Customer Experience Management, Negotiation Skills, Sales & Business Development, Sales & Business Development, Sales & Business Development, Fluent In Mandarin Chinese, A.P. Moller-Maersk, Hà Nội

Title: Kế Toán Giá Thành
Company: Momentum Industrial (Vietnam) Limited
Location: Tòa Nhà Xưởng Tiêu Chuẩn F, Lô Va. 06-08-10c, Đường số 17, Khu Chế Xuất Tân Thuận, Phường Tân Thuận Đông, Quận 7, Hồ Chí Minh, 2nd Floor, Standard Factory F, Lot Va. 06-08-10c, Street 17, Tan Thuan Export Processing Zone, Tan Thuan Dong Ward, District 7, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Job Description:
1. Production cost accounting:

• Develop, control and calculate product costs according to each order or production batch in the field of electronics.

• Track and allocate production costs (raw materials, labor, general costs) for each product.

• Periodically check and evaluate the difference between the actual cost and the plan, analyze the causes and propose optimization solutions.

• Coordinate with production and warehouse departments to ensure accurate and timely figures.

• Manage the BOM system and production time to serve the cost calculation.

2. Other jobs:

• Supporting the development and improvement of the accounting system and internal financial reporting.

• Participate in financial analysis and budget planning for the business.

• Ensure the full fulfillment of tax obligations in accordance with the law.

• Perform other tasks at the request of the manager.
Job Requirements:
1. Education:

• Graduated from a university majoring in Accounting, Auditing, Finance or related fields.

2. Experience:

• At least 3 years of experience in the position of general accountant and/or production cost accounting, preferably in the field of electronics manufacturing.

• Experience working with Misa accounting software, ERP or equivalent management software systems.

3. Professional skills:

• Understand the production process and material norms.

• Master the legal regulations on accounting, taxation, and financial reporting.

4. Soft Skills:

• Good analytical, synthesizing and problem-solving skills.

• Communicate and coordinate effectively with relevant departments.

• English/Chinese communication is an advantage

5. Other requirement:

• Present your CV in English

6. Compensation & Benefits:

• Competitive salary, bonus according to work performance.

• Professional working environment, high promotion opportunities.

• Other benefits according to the company's regulations.

Company: Công ty TNHH Vietsun Holdings

Job Description:
• Tìm kiếm và phát triển khách hàng tiềm năng tại các thị trường quốc tế.
• Lên kế hoạch và theo dõi các chiến dịch tiếp thị mới.
• Duy trì liên hệ và xây dựng mối quan hệ bền vững với khách hàng hiện tại.
• Nắm vững kiến thức sản phẩm để tư vấn hiệu quả và phân tích xu hướng thị trường.
• Phối hợp với các phòng ban để đảm bảo dịch vụ chuyên nghiệp cho khách hàng.
• Báo cáo hoạt động bán hàng & đề xuất kế hoạch tuần cho Trưởng nhóm/Quản lý cấp trên.
• Xây dựng kế hoạch upsell, cross-sell nhằm đạt chỉ tiêu doanh số được giao.
Job Requirements:
• Ưu tiên ứng viên có ≥ 1 năm kinh nghiệm kinh doanh B2B quốc tế.
• Tốt nghiệp Cao đẳng/Đại học chuyên ngành: Xuất nhập khẩu, Kinh doanh quốc tế, Quản trị kinh doanh, Ngôn ngữ Anh, hoặc ngành liên quan phù hợp.
• Tiếng Anh tốt, giao tiếp, thuyết phục và đàm phán là kỹ năng thiết yếu. Biết thêm tiếng Trung, Ả Rập,... là một lợi thế lớn.
• Chủ động, cẩn thận, trung thực, hòa đồng và có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao.
• Có khả năng làm việc độc lập và theo nhóm.
• Yêu thích việc di chuyển trong và ngoài nước, sẵn sàng công tác để mở rộng thị trường.
